extension.name: JFBCSocialShare
extension.author: SourceCoast | www.sourcecoast.com
extension.description: This is the Social Sharing module that goes with the JFBConnect component, which lets users share pages from your site back to their social network with one click.

field.name: url
field.label: URL to Share
field.description: The URL to share, defaults to current page

field.name: layout_style
field.label: Layout
field.description: Determines the size and amount of social context next to the button

field.name: orientation
field.label: Orientation
field.description: Determines whether the buttons are vertically or horizontally oriented

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: Choose whether the buttons show as a standard fixed module or float to the side/top of the screen

field.name: margin
field.label: Margin
field.description: Set the margin around the entire set of buttons

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding
field.description: Set the padding around the entire set of buttons

field.name: background_color
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Set the background color

field.name: float_position_top
field.label: Float Position from Top
field.description: Set the position from top in px when 'Float' Position is set. Using a number greater than 3000 will float to the bottom of the screen

field.name: float_position_left
field.label: Float Position from Left
field.description: Set the position from the left in px when 'Float' Position is set. Using a number greater than 3000 will float to the right of the screen

field.name: facebook_enable
field.label: Show Facebook Like
field.description: Show Facebook Like button

field.name: facebook_share_enable
field.label: Show Facebook Share
field.description: Show Facebook Share button

field.name: facebook_show_faces
field.label: Show Faces
field.description: Show profile pictures below the Like Button

field.name: facebook_width
field.label: Width
field.description: The width of the Like Button frame, in pixels

field.name: facebook_height
field.label: Height
field.description: The height of the Like Button frame, in pixels

field.name: facebook_verb_to_display
field.label: Verb to Display
field.description: The verb to display in the Like Button

field.name: facebook_color_scheme
field.label: Color Scheme
field.description: The Like Button color scheme

field.name: facebook_ref
field.label: Ref
field.description: A label for tracking referrals to Facebook. Specifying the ref attribute will add the 'fb_ref' parameter to the referrer URL when a user clicks a link from the plugin.

field.name: facebook_kid_directed_site
field.label: Kid Directed Site
field.description: If your web site or online service, or a portion of your service, is directed to children under 13 you must enable this

field.name: linkedin_enable
field.label: Show LinkedIn Share
field.description: Show LinkedIn Share button

field.name: linkedin_show_zero
field.label: Show Zero
field.description: Whether to show a zero or a placeholder in the counter if there are no shares. Shows a 0 digit if layout is 'Button Count'. Shows a LinkedIn Icon if layout is 'Box Count'

field.name: google_enable
field.label: Show Google +1
field.description: Show Google +1 button

field.name: google_width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of +1 button

field.name: twitter_enable
field.label: Show Twitter Share
field.description: Show Twitter Share button

field.name: user_intro
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed above the social content.

field.name: showPoweredByLink
field.label: Show Powered By Link
field.description: Show 'Powered By' link
